newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian RTS shares index closes at record 288.49.
newsitem.headline: Russian RTS shares index closes at record 288.49.

text.p: The Russian Trading System 24-share index rose 3.5 percent to close at a record 288.49 on $56.06 million turnover for the entire market, the NAUFOR brokers association said on Thursday.
The flow of funds into the market since the beginning of the year has stunned operators and led some to fear a correction.
The index closed at 186.94 on December 23.
"The risks are so high right now, so everyone is trying to fix their profits for the day in the morning, or even at the second half of the day," said one trader.
But many operators said new foreign investors who had waited months to enter the market were buying on expectations of long-term growth.
New investors were less concerned with new price levels and quick appreciation of the market than were experienced Russia buyers, dealers said.
"The market is being driven by a wall of money," Diggle said.
